action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of abstract geometric shapes in various colors, including purple, green, pink, and orange. These shapes are arranged in a seemingly random pattern without any discernible order or context. The shapes are flat and appear to be two-dimensional, with no depth or shading to suggest three-dimensionality. There is no background or additional context provided within the image itself.
continue

The shapes are composed of simple lines and blocks, forming a pattern that is open to interpretation. The background is plain white, providing a stark contrast to the vivid colors of the shapes. There is no additional context or background story provided within the image itself.
